translations: 西多会（天主教隐修院修会之一）的

sentences.sentence: This Cistercian Abbey in Catalonia is one of the largest in Spain.
sentences.translation: 波夫·莱特修道院属于西多会修道院，是西班牙最大的修道院之一。

sentences.sentence: More than 530 Cistercian houses had been established across Europe by the year 1200.
sentences.translation: 到1200年，全欧洲有多于530个西斯特教团被创立。

sentences.sentence: But he could no more have rested on his laurels than he could have become a clergyman or a Cistercian monk.
sentences.translation: 他既不会为自已的成就沾沾自喜，也不会成为牧师或西多会的修士。
